DataSourcePortable.Name: CRM_META_SEMANAL_VICE_PRESIDENTE
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT SUM(A.VALORMETA)/4 PLANEJADO,
(SELECT COALESCE(SUM(VALORTOTAL+RECORRENTE+VALORSAAS),0)
FROM K_CRM_PESSOAOPORTUNIDADES
WHERE DATEPART(WEEK,DATAFECHAMENTO) = DATEPART(WEEK,GETDATE())
AND STATUS = 10) REALIZADO
FROM K_CRM_METASPERIODOS A
WHERE MONTH(A.DATA) = MONTH(GETDATE())
AND YEAR(A.DATA) = YEAR(GETDATE())" /> <Fields> <DecimalField Alias="PLANEJADO" From="A" Path="PLANEJADO" FieldDecimalsFormat="0" /> <DecimalField Alias="REALIZADO" From="A" Path="REALIZADO" FieldDecimalsFormat="0" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
